name: ivasms-multi-bot
description: Forward OTPs from multiple iVasms accounts to multiple Telegram groups (Heroku deploy).

CHAT_IDS.description: Comma-separated initial Telegram chat IDs where OTPs will be sent (optional)

IVASMS_ACCOUNTS.description: JSON array of iVasms accounts (preferred). Example: [{"username":"u1@mail.com","password":"p1"},{"username":"u2@mail.com","password":"p2"}]

USERNAME.description: (optional) single iVasms username (use only if not using IVASMS_ACCOUNTS)

PASSWORD.description: (optional) single iVasms password (use only if not using IVASMS_ACCOUNTS)

POLLING_INTERVAL_SECONDS.description: How often (seconds) the bot checks iVasms (default 5)
